a.h1: Hutsonville CUSD #1 Home of the Tigers

div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: Big Shout out and a big Thank you to Billy Burke and Midway Dine in and Carry out for providing pizza today, fresh off their new pizza ovens, for our food service workers, food delivery staff, and volunteers. We greatly appreciate your generous and thoughtful gesture for this amazing group!

Shout out and a big Thank you to Monical's Pizza for providing lunch for our food service workers, food delivery staff, and volunteers. We greatly appreciate your generous and thoughtful gesture for this amazing group!

HHS will turn on the baseball lights every Friday at 8:00 p.m. for 20 minutes starting tonight, through the month of May, for our seniors, as well as for all the healthcare workers, first responders, and all other essential workers on the frontlines of the pandemic.
Feel free to drive by and honk, but please stay in your cars. #LightsForTheFight, #HutsonvilleTigerPride
Great news, speech services will start again tomorrow, April 16, 2020.

p.a: Event: Baseball @ Vincennes Rivet Middle/High School
